content.expr: (INT x. a*x + b) = x ^ 2 / a + b * x + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. a*x - b) = x ^ 2 / a - b * x + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
exp(x) = SUM(n, 0, oo, x ^ n / factorial(n))
(a * b) ^ k = a ^ k * b ^ k
(a / b) ^ k = a ^ k / b ^ k
sin(a + b) = sin(a) * cos(b) + cos(a) * sin(b)
sin(a - b) = sin(a) * cos(b) - cos(a) * sin(b)
cos(a + b) = cos(a) * cos(b) - sin(a) * sin(b)
cos(a - b) = cos(a) * cos(b) + sin(a) * sin(b)
sin(a) + sin(b) = 2 * sin((a + b) / 2) * cos((a - b) / 2)
sin(a) - sin(b) = 2 * cos((a + b) / 2) * sin((a - b) / 2)
cos(a) + cos(b) = 2 * cos((a + b) / 2) * cos((a - b) / 2)
cos(a) - cos(b) = -2 * sin((a + b) / 2) * sin((a - b) / 2)
(INT x. 1 / (a * x + b)) = log(abs(a*x + b))/a+ SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. 1 / (a * x)) = log(abs(a * x)) / a+ SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. 1 / (a * x - b)) = log(abs(a * x - b)) / a + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. 1 / (-(a * x) + b)) = log(abs(-(a * x) + b)) / (-a) + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. 1 / (-(a * x) - b)) = log(abs(-(a * x) - b)) / (-a) + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. exp(a * x)) = exp(a * x) / a + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. exp(a * x + b)) = exp(a * x + b) / a + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. exp(a * x - b)) = exp(a * x - b) / a + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. exp(-(a * x))) = - exp(-(a * x)) / a + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. sin(a * x)) = - (cos(a * x) / a) + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. sin(a * x + b)) = -cos(a * x + b) / a + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. cos(a * x)) = sin(a * x) / a + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. cos(a * x + b)) = sin(a * x + b) / a + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. tan(a*x + b)) = log(abs(sec(a*x + b))) / a + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. tan(a*x - b)) = log(abs(sec(a*x - b))) / a + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. 1 / (a ^ 2 + x ^ 2)) = (1 / a) * arctan(x / a) + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. 1 / (a + x ^ 2)) = (1 / sqrt(a)) * arctan(x / sqrt(a)) + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. 1 / (a + b * x ^ 2)) = (1 / sqrt(a*b)) * arctan(sqrt(a/b)*x) + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. 1 / (b * x ^ 2 + a)) = (1 / sqrt(a*b)) * arctan(sqrt(a/b)*x) + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. x ^ k * log(x)) = x ^ (k + 1) * log(x) / (k + 1) - x ^ (k + 1) / (k + 1) ^ 2 + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x:[0,1]. x ^ m * log(x) ^ n) = (-1)^n * factorial(n) / (m+1) ^ (n+1)
(INT x:[0,oo]. exp(-(x * y)) * sin(a * x)) = a / (a ^ 2 + y ^ 2)
(INT x. a ^ x) = a ^ x / log(a) + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. cos(x) ^ 2) = 1/4 * sin(2 * x) + 1/2 * x + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. sec(a*x + b)) = log(abs(sec(a*x+b)+tan(a*x+b))) / a + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x. sec(a*x - b)) = log(abs(sec(a*x-b)+tan(a*x-b))) / a + SKOLEM_CONST(C)
(INT x:[0, oo]. x ^ (m - 1) / (x + 1)) = pi / sin(m * pi)
SUM(n, l, u, f(n)) = f(a) + SUM(n, a+1, u, f(n))
SUM(n, l, u, f(n)) = SUM(n, l, a-1, f(n)) + SUM(n, a, u, f(n))
SUM(n, l, u, f(n)) = SUM(n, l, a, f(n)) + SUM(n, a+1, u, f(n))
SUM(n, l, u, f(n)) = SUM(n, l, a, f(n)) + SUM(n, a+1, u, f(n))
SUM(n, l, u, f(n)) = SUM(n, l, a-1, f(n)) + SUM(n, a, u, f(n))
SUM(n, l, u, f(n)) = SUM(n, l, a-1, f(n)) + f(a) + SUM(n, a+1, u, f(n))
SUM(n, l, u, f(n)) = f(a) + SUM(n, a+1, u, f(n))
SUM(n, l, u, f(n)) = SUM(n, l, a-1, f(n)) + f(u)
SUM(n, 0, oo, f(n)) = SUM(n, 0, oo, f(2*n+1)) + SUM(n, 0, oo, f(2*n))
MUL(n, l, u, f(n)) = MUL(n, l, u-1, f(n)) * f(u)
MUL(n, l, u, f(n)) = f(l) * MUL(n, l+1, u, f(n))
(LIM {n -> oo}. factorial(n) / (sqrt(2 * pi * n) * (n / exp(1)) ^ n)) = 1
